comments.body: IMHO it would be better to use the existing setup_mongodb stuff so we have once place where the version etc is updated. This should be possible. If I remember correctly the mongodb_parameter and mongodb_user int tests work with a single mongod instance.

all modules use the ```setup_mongodb``` dependency
```
# head -n 1 test/integration/targets/setup_mongodb/defaults/main.yml 
mongodb_version: "4.0"
```
and a bit below
```
baseurl: https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/{{mongodb_version}}/x86_64/
```

@rhysmeister , i'm going to maintain this module including used server versions, etc.
Would be cool to see it merged until 02 March when the main repo becomes frozen.
If there are no critical points about the module's logic, please, approve this.
We can improve / refactor it later.
I'm a maintainer of Postgres and MySQL stuff for more than a year and now looking at Mongo-specific support.
